website_summaries.verdict: With a beautifully detailed and with a classic map look, this gigantic wall map matches decor at home and provides a valuable learning resource in the classroom.
pros: Laminated, low-gloss surface creates both durability and functionality: can write on with dry-erase markers and clean off easily
Larger size means more cities are included
Users love the hues that differentiate the land masses from the water, and also enjoy the old-fashioned map coloration
cons: Although not designed to need framing, users who have chosen to do so had to have a custom frame built because of the odd size

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you want an enormous map.
customer_reviews.text: This map is gigantic..I'm not exactly sure what I had in mind when I bought it. It was a late night unisom shopping incident. I have a place for it. The kids love it. My husband and I got a good laugh while hanging it up. The map itself is gorgeous. Ours arrived with zero damage, creases or dents. It was nicely packaged. I'd buy it again. (If I needed another GIANT map lol) Update: 1/2/2016 ... We've had the map a few months and we couldn't be happier with our purchase. We've learned so much! It REALLY helps to have a map of this size and quality while doing history and geography lessons!!!
customer_reviews.author: MommyH

customer_reviews.title: Huge, attractive, and well-worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: We bought this map for our 7-year-old map lover with an aviation-themed bedroom. It is huge and takes up a good bit of the wall, which we wanted it to do. The size makes it fun and easy to locate places on the map. It blends well with decor because of the muted colors. It is laminated and comes well-packaged, but as expected, it does not come with any mounting materials. We used java gel stain stain on 2 1x1 boards, stapled to the backs of the tops and bottom, with 4 saw-tooth hangers across the top for a vintage/classroom feel. As a homeschool family, I am considering purchasing a second one for our home classroom/study area.
customer_reviews.author: Homeschool Mom of 4

customer_reviews.title: Huge! Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Huge map! Built a custom frame for this and it works perfectly in my living room. It was thick and packaged correctly. Another review said they were unable to get the map out so I was worried, but that was not the case for me. Displays beautifully on my wall. Bubbled up but that's because I attached it to cardboard. Aka my dumb mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: I love this map
customer_reviews.text: I love this map! Great quality, accuracy, and classy look. As others have mentioned, hard to find a frame this size. We made our own by buying door framing from Home Depot and it looks nice. The map is glossy, so we didn't even need to use glass. Just put the map directly on the wall and adhered the frame to the wall around it.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful map
customer_reviews.text: Love this map! It really added a lot of character to our office. I bought some crown molding and cut it to make a custom frame around the map. It really made it look even CLASSIER than before. The muted colors in the map give it an "old world" feel.
customer_reviews.author: Neal Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Large Map
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my husband as he's an avid world reader and is always looking up where events occurred in a map book. He was thrilled with this size and now has it hanging in his man cave room. Too have this framed would be costly so we opted to use clear push pins to mount it on the wall. The laminate finish looks classy and will keep this map looking fresh for years to come. The print is easy to read. This map arrived at a timely fashion and was boxed exceptionally well. A box within a box so there was no danger of damage short of being run over by the delivering carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Leisa Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for wall in guest bedroom with intention of putting push pins in everytime we travel to a location, map is very large and nicely laminated so easy to hang, the last one I bought (from a different company) was not and ripped easily when I tried to hang it. Overall I am happy with my purchase, only complaint would be for the size of the map it seems to be missing some pretty popular travel locations, for example, Cozumel is not on the map, not even the island is platted. Overall it is a nice map. My only reason for not giving it 5 stars are the clarity of some of the locations and missing locations
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Dralle

customer_reviews.title: From office zero to hero
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been in a bare-walled office for over a year. Sure I could go buy some used art from a garage sale and hang it up but this looks so much better and it’s super useful as well. I didn’t know how picky I was about maps until I starting trying to shop for one. And I feel confident saying this is the best looking one out there. They also have an antique version that I might look into getting for my home that also looks cool. But my office is covered for now! Pun intended
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Are you a size queen ?
customer_reviews.text: Are you a size queen ? Do you enjoy large maps ? Do you like quality products for fair prices ? If so this map is gonna really impress you as it did me. Came in great safe packaging, Even if there had been damage to the box, this map is packed in a way that would keep it safe. This map is clear , you can make out all of the writing on it with out any trouble, the colors are crisp and it is very sturdy. also here is the good part : THIS MAP IS HUGE ! maps this size and quality usually cost much more . Buy it , you'll love it !
customer_reviews.author: Saul

customer_reviews.title: Great Large Durable Map
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in my vintage escape room office. Love the laminate on it for durability. Love the muted colors. It fit what I was looking for perfectly. It also is so large it covers a lot of the wall, which is a great effect.
customer_reviews.author: Janell

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Breathtaking map that looks, due to the neutral tones, like a work of art when mounted. I'm very happy with this purchase; it came in a strong, sealed tube, which was itself inside a box. It arrived in perfect condition and I mounted it on finished ply using Scotch 77 photo-safe spray adhesive.
customer_reviews.author: dominic esteban

customer_reviews.title: Spacious
customer_reviews.text: I love my new living room decoration. I added a frame piece to the top and bottom, added twine to the top, and hung like a poster frame. It takes up my entire wall and is much nicer than looking at nothing. Hopefully any guests can appreciate some education as well.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Not useful for the classroom. Muted colors. BLAND.
customer_reviews.text: The description should NOT include that it can be used for a classroom. The muted colors make it impossible for usefulness for any instruction. The water is sand color and it’s really bland in attractiveness. Perhaps one could use it for decor if one wants a huge laminated muted wall map. I shared these thoughts directly with the business which contacted me directly asking for a review. I encouraged them to consider removing the ‘classroom’ verbiage. If you intend to USE this map consider a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great political detail
customer_reviews.text: This map is exactly what I was looking for! The material is a great weight and I had no problem unrolling it and tacking it to the wall right away. The map has great detail and lists more cities than other wall-sized maps I found. We have a very international work place and this map is used for all of us to indicate where we are from/where we studied so I was really happy to find this map that great political detail!
customer_reviews.author: magmel

customer_reviews.title: Best large map I have seen
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful map! I have been looking for a large map that is reasonably priced that is neutral in color and this map exceeds my expectations. It is on thick poster paper and is laminated which makes it easy to hang without scaring that it will tear. Can’t wait to start putting push pins in it for my son with all the places he has travel.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Burrier

customer_reviews.title: Great for a large wall!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had a large blank wall in her room and I wanted something to cover it. She is a travel freak and I thought this was the perfect option. She loves it! It fills the space and everyone comes in the room admires it!
customer_reviews.author: Liz S

customer_reviews.title: Such an awesome map! I actually bought it for my boyfriend's ...
customer_reviews.text: Such an awesome map! I actually bought it for my boyfriend's birthday because he loves, well, maps hahaha. He was super stoked about the present and we are going to get a frame custom made by our family! :)
customer_reviews.author: Linh N

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Classroom!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this world map. We’re using it in my classroom to pinpoint areas where we receive postcards. My students are able to visually see each continent and country. I also love that it’s not so vibrant because it becomes a bit overwhelming in the classroom. My 2nd graders love to spend their time just staring at it often.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna R.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking to fill my wall
customer_reviews.text: This large world map is beautiful to view in my home office. The laminated finish is a nice touch and light weight enough that I was able to hang by myself with 3M Command poster strips. Took my time and planned how to do this right, but it was easy. I personally like the soft pastel colors vs vibrant colors of other versions. My walls are a darker grey.
customer_reviews.author: NancyS

customer_reviews.title: Accurate map
customer_reviews.text: I love this map. I bought it to replace a map tapestry that, while very pretty, was not accurate at all. This map is durable and will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: The size is great, and the detail is pretty good (it could ...
customer_reviews.text: The size is great, and the detail is pretty good (it could use a little more in terms of major city locations). I wish the colors were a bit brighter, which is why I'm giving 4 stars instead of 5.
customer_reviews.author: ejr

customer_reviews.title: It goes great on my wall
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a map that was classic looking but easy to read- this is just that- I love that is laminated so I hope it lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Catalina Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: very happy with this map
customer_reviews.text: No issues with delivery time or packaging. The map was delivered rolled up in a long tube. Take care when unwrapping. We laid out the map on our floor for few days, as we bought the two pieces of wood in Lowes and painted them. Then nailed these to our wall together with the map. Looks great, it goes very well with our decor and I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Radka Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Just as described!
customer_reviews.text: I love this map, it looks great and it seems durable enough. I plan on mounting it on some cork and framing it then putting push pins into it and yarn to show my travelings. Love the size of it too and the muted tones of the image.
customer_reviews.author: w. tyler sall

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a world map that meets my needs
customer_reviews.text: Color scheme is excellent. Enough contrast to make a difference, but doesn't look like a 4th grade class. Borders are visable but not distracting. Rivers and mountain ranges are clear. Was updated in 2019. Only complaint is that too many cities are listed on small countries, thus obstruring the geographic details (ie. the Balkans). Overall an excellent map.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin @ Livermore

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a bargain for a huge map. The colors go well with the look I wanted. Gray muted background great for a modern decor. This costs twice as much from the makers website. The laminate is great too. I spray glued the map to insulated foam board for an inexpensive backing and will hang on wall to show our family travels.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! Very clear and great material!
customer_reviews.text: This map is awesome!! It’s the perfect size for an entire bedroom wall. It is laminated so you don’t have to worry about it ripping. The printing is easy to read. I loved it so much I have since bought more for family members!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I've found nothing to dislike so far. The detail is great without being cluttered. Colors are sharp. I bought for my geography classroom and it hasn't disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Utahson

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: I like the size but the map comes with marks and wrinkly.
customer_reviews.author: MH Chiu

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, easy to read
customer_reviews.text: My map arrived quickly, and I'm pleased with the quality of the paper and lamination. The map itself is easy to read, and the colors that distinguish the countries are helpful. I think everyone should hang a map on a wall of their homes. Many of us are woefully ignorant of so much of the world, and this map is helping me already!
customer_reviews.author: Logan Ferrelle

customer_reviews.title: Huge, beautiful map
customer_reviews.text: Despite other reviewers commenting about how large this map is, I still underestimated the size. This map is MASSIVE. I would definitely recommend measuring the space you plan to put it before ordering, as I was surprised it was almost too big for my wall. Beautiful colors, good quality, highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: ... map to have for my history classroom and was happy when I found this giant map
customer_reviews.text: I've always wanted a larger map to have for my history classroom and was happy when I found this giant map. Unfortunately, despite coming in a huge box the map was crushed flat and impossible to layout flatly on a wall now.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful addition to a newly painted room
customer_reviews.text: I love this Map! My dates wanted to mark her travels and this map does it beautifully. The color is perfect for a bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WYSIWYG
customer_reviews.text: Map was exactly as pictured and described; Great-looking product that meets our expectation; Shipped in a sturdy tube; Arrived 2 days after ordered; What else to say.. Very pleased with the product and service and will consider the vendor again for future purchases
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Very large, good quality, excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality laminated map. Very large which is perfect for my large office wall. I have decided to have it framed but delighted with how fast it shipped, how it was packaged and value for money. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking map
customer_reviews.text: This looks great in my son's room and he looks at it all the time. Big, accurate, and nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Huge!
customer_reviews.text: This map is huge! I Purchase this for my room and I love it! It also comes laminated which is a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Amare

customer_reviews.title: A great teaching tool!
customer_reviews.text: I really like my map I recently purchased for my classroom. I used it quite often as a reference while I teach Social Studies. When people walk into my classroom, it is one of the first items they notice hanging on my wall. I love the size of the map because my class can gather around while I teach!
customer_reviews.author: Girl Wonder

customer_reviews.title: Good map, could acheive Great/Best status with shaded-releif seafloor bathymetry.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent laminated political world map. I really enjoy the size and toned down color. Only improvement I can recommend is to add shaded relief to seafloor bathymetry and label prominent marine features (similar to NatGeo world maps). Have this hanging in my office.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Husband loved it
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a Christmas gift to my husband and he loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Jean S.

customer_reviews.title: Love the large size
customer_reviews.text: Love the large size! I wanted a map above my desk that would help me recognize countries that are not well known...this one does the trick! It helps peak my interest in places that I might never hear about...good quality too!
customer_reviews.author: Jan Marie

customer_reviews.title: Just as describes, just what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted, makes for a great wall piece. We got some thin, cheap plastic edging from Home Depot to glue on the map, as well as some rope from the dollar store to give it the scroll type look. We also used velcro to keep it flush with the wall, worked out well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big and very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Now is that Ill know all the countries and their capitals at least
customer_reviews.author: marina krol

customer_reviews.title: Go big or go home!
customer_reviews.text: We plan on homeschooling our children and wanted a map for the teaching room. We went with the largest size and have no regrets! It looks absolutely beautiful on the wall!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged before Packaged
customer_reviews.text: Map arrived in a cardboard tube, yet it still had a weird fold in it. Hung it up anyway, but due to the nice glossy finish, the mark from the fold is a real eyesore.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Huge with a lot of details
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful addition to our home ❤️ Wanted to surprise hubby and hang it myself but I couldn’t. It’s a 2 people job. We love it makes us want to travel moreeee
customer_reviews.author: Marili

customer_reviews.title: A LARGE, ACCURATE MAP
customer_reviews.text: This is a large map, which we put in a hallway. It is nice looking, not garish. All information appears to be up to date, such as Myanmar, (not Burma), Yangon, (not Rangoon), etc.
customer_reviews.author: Eestlane

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful to look at, easy to read.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. We are having it framed and placed over the big Mantel in the living room.
customer_reviews.author: IreneCov

customer_reviews.title: It was ok.
customer_reviews.text: Nice map but the first 1 i ordered there was nothing in the box. I got sent another 1 & it was ok for the money. Says laminated, so I was expecting a thick plastic laminat, not much stronger than just a poster. But I like enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful map and nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Very well packaged for delivery. The muted colors of water and land are just what I was looking for. Beautiful map and nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Banner

customer_reviews.title: Great for the classroom!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for for my 6th grade classroom. We do world history in 6th grade and I wanted a really big world map to display on my back wall. This is perfect...all my students stop and look at it as they walk by!
customer_reviews.author: AML

customer_reviews.title: damaged
customer_reviews.text: hi, i send you some pictures about my order, it's damaged all long. sorry for my english..i don't speack verry well
customer_reviews.author: berthier

customer_reviews.title: You can see so many states due to the size and color.
customer_reviews.text: The map is the perfect size. It’s huge which allow you too see so much. I absolutely love it. The tube it came in protected the map very well.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Huge map, great for a large wall.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Was concerned when I read some of the reviews, but this is a wonderful map. Well laminated, highly recommend. As you can see, the encapsulation does reflect light, so there may be some glare, but looks worse in the photo than it is.
customer_reviews.author: Kipahulu

customer_reviews.title: It was more amazing than I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: This map is absolutely amazing. Very detailed. It was more beautiful and explained than I was expecting. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: We love it! Thank you
customer_reviews.text: We installed this giant map over our computer, it covers most of the wall there. I can see every country and watch where any news/action is happening in the world. We love it! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: beautiful pice of art
customer_reviews.text: this was a birthday gift for my 9yr old grand son. He loves it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: K&D

customer_reviews.title: Such an awesome map. It fits in my basement well and ...
customer_reviews.text: Such an awesome map. It fits in my basement well and the kids keep going back to refer to it. Great quality for the price. Its HUGEEEE.
customer_reviews.author: Zak

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy paper but why is the water sand color and ...
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy paper but why is the water sand color and land blue? Also it came with wrinked edges - twice!
customer_reviews.author: Fun

customer_reviews.title: Great conversation piece
customer_reviews.text: placed this map in our employee lunch room and everyone "pinned" their home town. Great conversation piece!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Detailed World Map
customer_reviews.text: This map is incredible. I've always wanted a giant world map for my wall and finally decided to go with this one, and I'm really glad I did! The colors are very soft, yet defined enough to give a strong border for each country. There is an amazing level of detail and the font is easy to read. It looks great on my wall and is an awesome conversation starter!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan R.

customer_reviews.title: Great large map
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous map. It's very large and fills up the space on our wall just like we wanted. It came packaged very nicely and was easy to hang without creasing or bending.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Love the Subtle Colors!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the colors and the quality of the map. I installed cork board to turn it into a push pin map and made a custom frame and it looks absolutely amazing.
customer_reviews.author: StephyB

customer_reviews.title: Great map, enough details and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Due to the size, it is a little hard and tricky to unfold it. Include some recommendation to make it be more strait would be useful for customers
customer_reviews.author: Marcos

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT! Good product and service will purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Covers the wall, LOVE IT! Good product and service will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality map with excellent detail! Very well packaged, fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: LtDan

customer_reviews.title: HUGE map with great details.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing map and a great size. The labeling is very clear and easy to read. The muted colors look great (some maps are just too colorful).
customer_reviews.author: Adam T.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: (Please ignore the photos pinned on the map) It’s HUGE. It’s a really nice looking map. I’m beyond satisfied with this item. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Ezeiza Ortega

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s beautiful Just what I wanted Could have been thicker but I very very happy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and detailed
customer_reviews.text: The wall map is incredibly detailed and accurate. The huge size is awesome and the classic color scheme is beautiful. We have it hanging in our bedroom and it looks like a piece of art.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It Looks Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The Map is great, very big, takes up a lot of space in the room, I do suggest hanging it up with some help in order to prevent bending it because the creases do not go away unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Easmond

customer_reviews.title: We love this map!
customer_reviews.text: We love this. Such a great accent to our home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Used as a wall covering and is great. Adhesive worked very well with it.

customer_reviews.title: Antarctica?
customer_reviews.text: I like the map but if you look closely you make notice pretty much a whole continent is missing
customer_reviews.author: S. Plisken

customer_reviews.title: Great map
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It's just a great size to be over the couch, so whenever I hear of a place on TV I can turn around and find it on the map.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Ann Kroeger

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love in our homeschool room
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous map. Absolutely love in our homeschool room. Really beautiful!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great item! Looks wonderful framed in my sons adventure themed nursery.

customer_reviews.title: It's such a great way to make anyone excited about traveling
customer_reviews.text: I first bought this map on sale for my mom for Christmas and couldn't resist myself for buying one for myself. It's such a great way to make anyone excited about traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Dela Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful large map, heavy paper
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in sturdy cardboard tube, in perfect condition. A nice thicker paper, like a glossy photo paper. Very pleased with the subdued colors. It depicts the “curvature” of the globe by showing Russia & Alaska on both sides, which is really great. Overall, very pleased with this purchase. A wonderful map at a great price.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This map is exactly what I was looking for. I love the color of it because Its not so vibrant. It looks very classy in my office. Very happy with it!

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: love having the world in my place. it reminds me to travel more.

customer_reviews.text: Just what we wanted. Love the muted ocean color. Perfect for our sons play room!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous big map hangs in our dining room. We added the wood on the bottom and the top. Absolutely love

customer_reviews.title: Great large scale map
customer_reviews.text: Great print quality and packaged well. Plastic shrink wrap was a little hard to remove but that’s probably a sign of good packing. I do a lot of maps-related work and like having it on my office wall.

customer_reviews.title: The map arrived yesterday in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.text: The map arrived yesterday in perfect condition.. It is just what I expected and I am pleased with it.. It is going on my wall in my den.

customer_reviews.text: Impressive to look at A+ - just what I needed and perfect for my office setup!

customer_reviews.text: A great map! I was able to map everywhere I had planned to map. Maptastic.

product_meta.title: World Map Classic Style - Front Sheet Lamination - Cartographic Detail (A0 33 (h) x 47 (w) inches)
feature_bullets: POLITICAL MAP: Created by expert cartographers, the large world map poster features every country in a different color along with hill shading and time zones.
CLASSIC TONES: A beautiful addition to any office or family room wall, world maps add color and interest and this world map print will blend with any home décor.
WRITE-ON FINISH: The classic world map has write-on, wipe clean front sheet lamination and measures 33 (h) x 47 (w) inches - ideal as a classroom world map.
CREASE-FREE DELIVERY: Your colorful, big world map poster is rolled in a tube for delivery, so it arrives ready to display.
MAPS INTERNATIONAL: Our philosophy of ‘cartographic excellence’ combines detail, design and high quality finishes in a range of stunning wall maps.
